texts.name: Abiss
texts.biography: Abiss wandered for many years with her Crabs through the isles. She learned how to get the best use out of their claws through countless battles.

specialty.description: Increases Speed of any Sand Crabs or Abyssal Crabs by 1 and their Attack and Defense skills by 5% for every 4 levels (rounded up)
specialty.name: Crabs
